title: The Cowboy Bargain
description: A little competition…Brings a change of heart.Sam Morgan never thought he’d see his ex-fiancée again after she skipped town days before their wedding. He certainly didn’t expect to find her opening a restaurant on his property—in the building he’d intended to sell his crafts from. This time Olivia’s sticking around, forcing Sam to strike a work together and see whose products sell best. Could their business venture lead to a surprising reunion?From Love Uplifting stories of faith, forgiveness and hope.Lazy M RanchBook 1: The Baby InheritanceBook 2: The Cowboy BargainBook 3: The Cowboy's Secret Past
author: Tina Radcliffe
